global.title: Global Stylings
global.description: This stylings aren't assigned to any module.

elements.title: Basic styles
elements.description:
This basic styles are applied all over the page.
Notice: No package definition here! This means, it all goes to a global/default package.

content.title: Content stylings
content.description: The content styling are applied to all elements in the content area of the page.

elements.title: Introductional area
elements.description:
This area is used right underneath the page head menu.
It increases the color contrast and font size of the child elements (h1, p).
The intro area is a bit darker than the rest of the page to make it pop out.
